dcterms:creator: Andrew Pilny
Aaron Schecter
Marshall Scott Poole
Noshir Contractor
dcterms:description: The dataset contains the sender, receiver, and timestamps of directed verbal messages (298 in total over a duration of 22 minutes) sent with Comm Net Radio (CNR) among 2 teams of 2 players each (a captain and a driver) playing a computer game where they carry out various virtual tasks to ensure the safety of a path for an emergency delivery, which requires substantial communication among the players.
dcterms:title: Multiple Team System (MTS) dataset
